pr_title: Add error message for invalid class

timeline.message: add error message for invalid class

timeline.bodyText: should say cannot find or load main class, I think?
timeline.author: cangencer

replies.bodyText: Open question: what's the point of writing in the standard err if it's thrown anyway? Won't you get the unfound class name in the exception?
replies.author: nfrankel

replies.bodyText: we have a verbose option which is off by default and it was not very descriptive enough in that case
replies.author: gurbuzali
